about_the_game:
Please note! After receiving the cheat in the game, the record will not be able to obtain any achievements!

This cheat can provide players with any amount of money, levels, skill experience points, and casino tokens.

And you can activate full assault to quickly eliminate all wild enemies without defeating them first (you still need to learn full assault first).

Chuangshen does not encourage players to use cheats, but players who really need it are advised to purchase DLC instead of changing game data in unknown ways.

After purchase, you can open the treasure chest in Clear's room to get the cheat device.
